body:
### The Last of the Phoenicians
Many writing systems that we use today descended directly from this "first alphabet". I hope to one day visit the glorious city Phoenix, A-Z and cheer on the mighty Coyotes.

![Phohoenix "Coyotes"](http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/10/PHXold.svg/200px-PHXold.svg.png)

Here is some useful information upfront:
* Phnx, 115
* http://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U10900.pdf

### Support or Contact
If you are having trouble with databases or operating systems contact language@data.io and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
name: Language
tagline: unicode, database and o/s related issues
